Title: Network Latency Issue
Summary: Users are experiencing high latency in the network.

Title: Email Delivery Failure
Summary: Emails are not being delivered to external domains.

Title: Database Connection Timeout
Summary: Frequent timeouts are occurring when connecting to the database.

Title: Application Crash on Login
Summary: The application crashes when users attempt to log in.

Title: Printer Not Responding
Summary: The office printer is not responding to print requests.
